bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Nadia Stamatova studied at the University of Architecture and Construction in Sofia, Bulgaria graduating in 1981. Since 1990 she is owner of a private firm "ADA-2-Nadya Stamatova", in Varna, Bulgaria (Architectural And Artistic Design Studio ADA-2).
Biographical information translated by Milka Bliznakov.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of her curriculum vitae, a portfolio, and photocopies of her work. Some selected projects include the International Design Center in an abandoned quarry near Pusiano, Italy, a competition project; and the hotel "Ivanov-Lukanov" near Varna, 1991.
